author: Kevin Goddard
title: Stream Future’s New Album “Hndrxx”
text:
Home > Music > Stream Future’s New Album “Hndrxx” Stream Future’s New Album “Hndrxx” 0 0 Posted by Kevin Goddard , Feb 23, 2017 at 11:34pm It's here! Stream Future's second album in as many weeks called "Hndrxx." It’s safe to say Future has taken the industry by storm over these past couple weeks. In the days following last week’s self-titled album, rumors circulated online that the Freebandz Gang leader was prepping the release of ANOTHER album for this Friday (2/24), which he later confirmed Tuesday night on social media was indeed true. Now, with the clock striking midnight, Future’s second album in as many weeks has once again arrived via Apple Music called Hndrxx . Containing 17 tracks in total (same as last week’s), Hndrxx features two guest appearances from superstars Rihanna and “Low Life” collaborator The Weeknd , who appears on the song "Comin Out Strong." “This is the album I always wanted to make, timing is everything,” Future said with the announcement earlier this week. “Hndrxx is more personal. This is the ‘Honest’ album I was supposed to be honest about.” Available on iTunes , fans can now stream the project in its entirety via Apple Music (below). What record you feeling the most? < class="robots-nocontent" rel=""> Feb 23, 2017 at 11:34pm 2 Views
